item.title: Detecting and Analysing SSH Attacks With ksqlDB
item.description: I’ve written previously about ingesting syslog into Kafka and using KSQL to analyse it. I want to revisit the subject since it’s nearly two years since I wrote about it and some things have changed since then. ksqlDB now includes the ability to define connectors from within it, which makes setting things up loads easier.
